channel.title: World 2 Size
channel.description: I was just wondering about what exactly are the dimensions of World 2. On one end, the world ends at about 530, and in another direction, it ends at about 400. Those seem like very strange numbers for a nice size of the world.

item.title: World 2 Size
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:4, topic:418885”]Obviously because it is 500 blocks from spawn.

(spawn isn’t at 0,0 you know?)[/quote]

OH! That makes much more sense. For some reason, I always think that the spawn (or origin) is at 0, 0.

Read full topic

item.title: World 2 Size

item.title: World 2 Size
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:2, topic:418885”]It is 1000x1000 total size.

That makes it exactly 500 blocks in each direction from spawn.[/quote]

Then why do I keep getting “You’ve reached the edge of this world” messages at about (-300, 400)?

Read full topic
